title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4107.3 - Liabilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4107.3 - Liabilities

State Regulations

All persons interested in a stable or operating
thereunder, whether incorporated or not, shall be liable for all entry fees and
penalties against the stable. If one of such persons is suspended or refused a
license, all the horses in such stable shall be excluded from
racing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4107.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
